name: fail2ban
tagline: A security service that blocks malicious login attempts by analyzing system logs
description: Fail2Ban scans log files to detect malicious login attempts and automatically updates firewall rules to block offending IPs. It is widely used to protect SSH and other services on Linux servers with minimal configuration.

features.title: Security
features.description: Automatic IP blocking, Brute-force protection, Real-time threat response. Protect your services from attacks

features.title: Log Monitoring
features.description: Scans system logs continuously. Detects malicious patterns instantly

features.title: Firewall Integration
features.description: Updates iptables automatically. Seamless security enforcement

features.title: Multi
features.description: Protects SSH, web servers, and more. Comprehensive coverage

features.title: Customizable Rules
features.description: Define your own filters and actions. Flexible security policies

features.title: Email Alerts
features.description: Get notified of bans and attacks. Stay informed
